name: Thomas D. PREVISH, Executor of the Estate of Judith A. Bills, Deceased, Appellant, v. NORTHWEST MEDICAL CENTER-OIL CITY CAMPUS and Robert M. Pilewski, M.D.
name_abbreviation: Prevish v. Northwest Medical Center-Oil City Campus

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
SAYLOR, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Thomas D. PREVISH, Executor of the Estate of Judith A. Bills, Deceased, Appellant, v. NORTHWEST MEDICAL CENTER-OIL CITY CAMPUS and Robert M. Pilewski, M.D.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
SAYLOR, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
ZARPALA, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David J. Watson, Pittsburgh and Alan D. Levy, for Prevish.
Lynn Bell, Pittsburgh, for Robert W. Pitewski, M.D.
T. Warren Jones and Matthew W. McCullough, Erie, for Northwest Medical Center.
casebody.head_matter:
717 A.2d 1023
Thomas D. PREVISH, Executor of the Estate of Judith A. Bills, Deceased, Appellant, v. NORTHWEST MEDICAL CENTER-OIL CITY CAMPUS and Robert M. Pilewski, M.D.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 15, 1998.
Decided Oct. 8, 1998.
David J. Watson, Pittsburgh and Alan D. Levy, for Prevish.
Lynn Bell, Pittsburgh, for Robert W. Pitewski, M.D.
T. Warren Jones and Matthew W. McCullough, Erie, for Northwest Medical Center.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
